content.chorus:
Anyi abiawo Chineke anyi abiawo Nna
Anyi abiawo ikele gi gozie anyl Chukwu
verses:
Bianu umu Chineke k'anyi kelee Nna
Bianu ndi kwere na okpara ya Jesu

Too nu Chneke Onye kere uwa nile
Toonu Chineke Onye n'echekwa-ba ya

Chukwu ebuka, Chukwu ebuka
Ngozi ya kari akari n'ebe anyi no
Kelee ya, kelee ya, kelenu Chukwu.

Gi bu Nna Nw'ekele anyi m'ututu m'ehihie
Gi bu Nna nw'otito anyi ma mgbede m'anyasi.
